metadata.description: Legal compliance rules for NDA validation under Indian law

section_10_essentials.description: Essential elements for valid contract formation

required_elements.explanation: Agreement must show willing consent without coercion, fraud, or misrepresentation
Agreement must have valid consideration (can be mutual promises)
Parties must be legally competent to enter contract
Purpose of NDA must be lawful and not against public policy

section_27_restraints.description: Prohibition of agreements in restraint of trade

prohibited_patterns: shall not engage in similar business after termination
restricted from working in same industry after
prohibited_clauses.explanation: Section 27 makes post-termination non-compete clauses void and unenforceable in India
prohibited_clauses.exception: During employment restrictions are valid; only post-termination is void

prohibited_clauses.explanation: Absolute or indefinite trade restrictions violate Section 27

valid_restrictions: Confidentiality obligations during and after employment

guidelines.explanation: Liquidated damages should be genuine pre-estimate, not penalty. Excessive amounts may be reduced by court.
Indian courts distinguish liquidated damages from penalties. Penalties are unenforceable.

indian_company_requirements.explanation: For Indian companies, having Indian jurisdiction ensures enforceability

risk_jurisdictions: subject to laws of [non-Indian jurisdiction] only
indian_company_requirements.risk_explanation: Foreign-only jurisdiction creates enforcement challenges for Indian company
